title: Reports
context: [ยง206E-199 Reports. (a)] After a reasonable time has elapsed, the authority may present its opinion and recommendations to the governor, the legislature, the public, or any of these. The authority shall include with this opinion any reply made by the landowner. [(b)] The authority shall submit to the various landowners in the district a quarterly report discussing the authority&rsquo;s activities under this part. The report shall be made available to the public upon request. [L 2004, c 188, pt of ยง2] Revision Note Section is a blend of two sections.
